mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file (parent_table, parent_no, file_name, origin_name, file_path, file_size, file_code) VALUES (#{parentTable}, #{parentNo}, #{fileName}, #{originName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileCode})
mapper.update: UPDATE file SET parent_table = #{parentTable}, parent_no = #{parentNo}, file_name = #{fileName}, origin_name = #{originName}, file_path = #{filePath}, file_size = #{fileSize}, reg_date = #{regDate}, upd_date = #{updDate}, file_code = #{fileCode} WHERE no = #{no}
